item.title: BFI London Film Festival Adds Willem Dafoe-Starring ‘The Souffleur,’ Paolo Sorrentino’s ‘La Grazia’
item.description: Movies with Matt Dillon and Mia McKenna-Bruce, as well as Sian Clifford, also join the lineup of the fest.

item.title: ‘Jay Kelly,’ ‘Hamnet,’ ‘Frankenstein,’ ‘After The Hunt,’ ‘Is This Thing On?’ Among Major Premieres in Full BFI London Film Festival Lineup
item.description: Richard Linklater’s ‘Blue Moon,’ the Sydney Sweeney-starring ‘Christy’ and Bruce Springsteen biopic ‘Deliver Me From Nowhere’ are also set to premiere at the London fest this October.

item.title: ‘Jay Kelly,’ ‘Hamnet,’ ‘Frankenstein,’ ‘After The Hunt,’ ‘Is This Thing On?’ Among Major Premieres in Full BFI London Film Festival Lineup
item.description: Richard Linklater’s ‘Blue Moon,’ the Sydney Sweeney-starring ‘Christy’ and Bruce Springsteen biopic ‘Deliver Me From Nowhere’ are also set to premiere at the London fest this October.

item.title: Daniel Day-Lewis, Richard Linklater and Yorgos Lanthimos Set for Talks at BFI London Film Festival
item.description: Celebrated filmmakers Jafar Panahi, Lynne Ramsay and Chloé Zhao will also join for sessions at this year’s edition of Screen Talks in the British capital.

item.title: Charli xcx and Emma Corrin to Close BFI London Film Festival With ‘100 Nights of Hero’ U.K. Premiere
item.description: Nicholas Galitzine, Maika Monroe, Amir El-Masry, Richard E. Grant and Felicity Jones will also be in attendance at London Film Fest’s closing night gala in October.

item.description: Nicholas Galitzine, Maika Monroe, Amir El-Masry, Richard E. Grant and Felicity Jones will also be in attendance at London Film Fest’s closing night gala in October.

item.title: Saoirse Ronan, Tessa Thompson Movies, Mona Fastvold’s ‘The Testament of Ann Lee’ With Amanda Seyfried Set for London Film Fest Competition
item.description: George Mackay and Callum Turner’s Venice-bound ‘Rose of Nevada’ will also compete at this year’s BFI London Film Festival, along with Lucrecia Martel’s debut movie ‘Landmarks’.
